pages.text: While most associated with the Gate-and-Key, in fact all Elder Ones have the ability to open holes in timespace and allow movement of living beings through them. This rite links two Octagrams of the same type as $(marked)warping point$(), creating a two-way gate. Octagrams are linked using the $(item)Incantation of the Gate-and-Key$().
The Rite must be performed $(l)only on the other Octagram.$()
